subject: Golf
Ears and Hearing
lead_paragraph: Sergio García had 12 putts through 12 holes and finished with 21 on his way to a second-round 64 and a one-shot advantage at the BMW Championship.
snippet: Sergio García had 12 putts through 12 holes and finished with 21 on his way to a second-round 64 and a one-shot advantage at the BMW Championship.
